long_description: Kryptonite KryptoFlex 1218 combo cable lock offers added security for your bike or accessories and uses a resettable combo for key-free ease of use. Flexible 12mm braided-steel cable provides solid cut-resistance; cable is coated to help protect the finish of your bike frame. Don't worry about forgetting your key, thanks to the integrated 4-digit resettable combination lock with indexed number dials for error-free combination setting. Includes a versatile mounting bracket and rip-and-stick retention strap for hassle-free transportation. Kryptonite rates the Kryptonite KryptoFlex 1218 combo cable lock a 2 on a 10-point system with 1 being simple, deterrent security and 10 being extreme security.
short_description: Kryptonite KryptoFlex 1218 combo cable lock offers added security for your bike or accessories and uses a resettable combo for key-free ease of use.
